mapper.insert: insert into publish_content ( category, description, images, contact_name, mobilephone, province, city, area, location, address, is_top, open_id, status, create_time, update_time, is_del ) values ( #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, now(), now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select id, agency_name as agencyName, sys_user_name as sysUserName, sys_user_password as sysUserPassword, mobilephone as mobilephone, email as email, open_id as openId, is_cooperation as isCooperation, city, location, address, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_del as isDel from agency_base where is_del = 0 limit #{start},#{length}

select pc.id, pc.description, pc.images, pc.contact_name as contactName, pc.mobilephone, pc.province, pc.city, pc.area, pc.location, pc.open_id as openId, p.chinese as category, pc.address, pc.update_time as updateTime, pc.create_time as createTime from publish_content pc left join parameter p on pc.category = p.para_value where pc.id = #{id} and pc.is_del = 0 and p.para_domain = 'publish.category'

select id, category, description, images, contact_name as contactName, mobilephone, city, location, status, open_id as openId, update_time as updateTime, create_time as createTime from publish_content where status = #{status} and is_del = 0
mapper.update:
update publish_content
category = #{category},
description = #{description},
images = #{images},
contact_name = #{contactName},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
area = #{area},
location = #{location},

is_top = #{isTop},

where id = #{id}
